page.title: 20FOLK CUSTOMS
page.content: AN ANNUAL EVENT AT WOODCOTE IS A STEAM RALLY WHICH TAKES PLACE IN JULY.THERE IS A DISPLAY OF STEAM ENGINES, TRACTORS,OLD CARS,MOTOR BIKES AND BICYCLES.PEOPLE DEMONSTRATE HANDCRAFTS MADE LOCALLY SUCH AS HANDBAGS,GLOVES AND CLAY POTS.LOCAL SOCIETIES HAVE STALLS ENCOURAGING CARE OF THE COUNTRYSIDE.PAULA'S FATHER TAKES TWO OLD TRACTORS WHICH HE KEEPS AT TOKERS GREEN. THE OTHER EVENTS IN THE VILLAGE ARE RELATED TO FUND RAISING ACTIVITIES IN THE SCHOOL.THEY HAVE A CARNIVAL DAY WITH FLOATS.SOMETIMES THE CHECKENDON HUNT COMES ACROSS THE AREA WITH HOUNDS AND HORSES.THE AUTUMN FUNFAIR,HELD EVERY YEAR CONTINUES SOME OF THE TRADITIONS OF THE OLD HIRING FAIR.
